nodes.text: Galitan was a remote moon located in the Ringali Nebula, in the Bormea sector of the Core Worlds. The turbulent forces of the nebula had caused Galitan to shatter into an asteroid field of molten fragments. During the Galactic Civil War, a major battle took place between the Galactic Empire and the New Republic, in which Captain Terisa Kerrill's Titan Squadron and Imperial reinforcements from Admiral Rae Sloane's fleet had trapped General Hera Syndulla's fleet, in an attempt to destroy the prototype Starhawk.
